title: Predicting the risk of nursing home placement of elderly persons using a population-based stratification score
content:
Publication date: November 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 236

Author(s): Giovanni Corrao, Matteo Franchi, Gloria Porcu, Alina Tratsevich, Andrea Stella Bonaugurio, Giulio Zucca, Danilo Cereda, Olivia Leoni, Guido Bertolaso
